dt-option.name: language.infoPostFix
dt-option.summary: String to append to all other summary information strings
dt-option.description:
If can be useful to append extra information to the info string at times, and this variable does exactly that.
This string will be appended to the `-init language.info` (`-init language.infoEmpty` and `-init language.infoFiltered` in whatever combination they are being used) at all times.

example.title: Postfix string to the information summary
